title: How to remove, wash and attach the BABYBJÖRN Travel Crib Light fabric – tutorial
description:
Watch our video tutorial on how to remove, wash and attach the BABYBJÖRN Travel Crib Light fabric. Both the mattress cover and crib fabric can be easily removed and washed in the machine. 

How to wash the travel crib: 
Crib fabric: Machine wash, warm (40°C). Do not tumble dry.
Mattress cover: Machine wash, hot (60°C).
Mattress: Do not machine wash.

Wash separately with a gentle, bleach-free detergent. The Travel Crib Light should be set up when you put the fabric back on. 

Other BABYBJÖRN video tutorials: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLHBhWZtwR_ZhsplUpc5vCSdLzHAUFvKdu&playnext=1

BABYBJÖRN Travel Crib Light is easy to carry, easy to use. 

• Simple to set up and fold up. Open the case, lift out the travel crib and set it up in one movement. There are no loose parts to attach. The legs unfold automatically and once you have placed the mattress in the crib you have a stable crib to use at home or on trips. 

• Easy to take with you. The travel crib only weighs 13 lb/6 kg. It’s easy to move around once it’s set up, and the case’s well-conceived design makes the travel crib easy to store, carry and stow in any baggage space – perfect for all kinds of journeys.

• Soft and comfy mattress. The travel crib comes with a soft and comfy mattress that makes it a cozy place for your baby to sleep. The mattress has a built-in base that keeps the lightweight travel crib standing firmly on the floor so your child can always sleep safely.

• A natural part of everyday life. The lightweight and cleverly designed travel crib is perfect for both small and great adventures. It’s as ideal for paying a short visit to a friend’s home as it is for longer journeys. You can also use the travel crib as a comfy extra crib at home.

Learn more about the Travel Crib Light: https://www.babybjorn.com/baby-cradle-and-travel-crib/travel-crib-light/

––––––––––
For more video tutorials on how to use BABYBJÖRN products, see our playlist BABYBJÖRN Video Tutorials here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLHBhWZtwR_ZhsplUpc5vCSdLzHAUFvKdu&playnext=1

Find more BABYBJÖRN videos on the Official BABYBJÖRN YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/babybjorn1961 

Visit us at: http://www.babybjorn.com
